final_answer:
The humor in this image comes from the juxtaposition of two different styles of depicting a television setup. 

On the left, the symbols layout is filled with stick figures, household items, and a classic television icon. It’s a simple, blocky representation of a family gathered around a television in a traditional home setting, suggesting a communal and cozy atmosphere.

On the right, the modern scene contrasts sharply with a sleek, minimalist living room featuring a large flat screen TV. The room is devoid of people, highlighting the isolation that can come with modern technology and design. 

The text "YES, BUT" at the top underscores the contrast between the nostalgic idea of family TV time and the contemporary, impersonal viewing experience, creating a satirical commentary on how technology has changed our social interactions and environments.
